title: Large 3BR in Edgewater 2-Flat
posting_body: ['What you Should Know', 'Unique Features', 'See this 3 bedroom, 1 bathroom apartment for rent in an owner-occupied 2-flat in Edgewater, Chicago.', 'Large living room, dining room, and cozy eat-in kitchen.', 'Complimentary laundry & storage space in the building.', 'Tenants pay for their electricity and cooking gas.', 'Landlord covers heat and water.', 'Interior Highlights', 'Large vintage apartment with Arts & Crafts moldings and stained glass.', 'Rent is $2,000 per month.', 'A security deposit of $2,000 is required.', 'Strenuous credit and background checks are required (however, no application fees).', 'Up to 2 cats are allowed (sorry, no dogs).', 'Best Things About the Building', 'Secure building with video security and fenced-in backyard.', 'Best Things About the Neighborhood', 'This apartment in Edgewater is located within a primarily residential area.', 'Plentiful street parking (no permits needed).', 'Walking distance to Whole Foods, Aldi, Walgreens, CVS, library, and red line trains.', 'Away from the Thorndale EL <-> Senn HS corridor.', 'Policies', 'Pet Policy', 'Cats OK.', 'Utilities Included', 'Gas, Heat', 'Apartment Features & Amenities', 'Washer/Dryer:', 'On-Site', 'Hardwood Floors', 'Dishwasher', 'Refrigerator', 'Stove', 'Separate Dining Room', 'Building Features & Amenities', 'On-site Management', 'Storage Space']
